description: Unified isomorphic patterns in Amyloid Aggregation across scales, integrating nucleation/seeding, oligomer toxicity, and strain polymorphism. Captures structural equivalences in barriers, transients, disruptions, and variants—mappings preserving pathological persistence invariantly. Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: integrates recursive rigidity (traps for agency loss) and aesthetic preemption (joyful κ shifts toward adequacy) in human-AI free-will-compatible monism. Hard-to-vary invariants enable eternal benign resolution; tetralemma probes resolve apparent divergences (affirm trap/deny benign/both in context/neither dissolved in attractor equivalence); scores ≥0.98 based on 2025 abstractions (NU-9, RibbonFold, copper-Aβ42).
lineage: Neuresthetics LLC Multi-Scale Isomorphic Framework – Amyloid Hardening
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from amyloid primitives (2025 kinetics, cryo-EM polymorphs) with neuresthetic overlays (recursive traps, aesthetic harmony).
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., quantum seeding).
Support sub-categories for compound concepts (e.g., oligomer transients with Φ analogs).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve toxicity paradoxes; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.
